articles.title: Ford and Rivian Announce Big Developments -- But Are They Buys Now?
articles.mainIdea: Ford and Rivian Announce Big Developments -- But Are They Buys Now?
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Ford and Rivian Announce Big Developments -- But Are They Buys Now?. Both Ford and Rivian made big headlines recently, but is there real growth to be had for investors? Related tickers mentioned: RACE, RIVN.

articles.title: Has Ford’s 43.2% Surge in 2025 Run Ahead of Its Fundamentals?
articles.mainIdea: Has Ford’s 43.2% Surge in 2025 Run Ahead of Its Fundamentals?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Has Ford’s 43.2% Surge in 2025 Run Ahead of Its Fundamentals?. If you are wondering whether Ford Motor is still a classic value play or if the recent run up has left it looking fully priced, you are not alone. This stock has been on a lot of investors' radar lately. Over the last year, Ford shares have climbed 43.2%, with a strong 38.4% gain year to date and almost doubling over 5 years. This move has plenty of people rethinking both its growth potential and risk profile. Much of this momentum has been driven by headlines around Ford's ramp up in...

articles.title: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion
articles.mainIdea: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion
articles.summary: GuruFocus.com: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion. Deal follows EV demand slowdown in the US, with transaction set to close by end-February. Related tickers mentioned: 373220.KS, HMC, HNDAF.
